text: in base.html just before </body> close. Just after the main.js include

I’ve had some weird isues where I based stuff on domcontentloaded and they never popped.

I ended up switching those to window load and it worked fine.
Maybe try that? If that isn’t it I’m not sure what else you’d need to do w/o looking at it
Try adding a meta-tag content expire property or similar through header data, looks like Firefox or similar page cache issue where page is not refreshed as a clean copy but rendered from the cache.
